text:
Hello,

We use XMLLayout and XMLSocketReceiver for displaying logging events in Chainsaw 
1.99.99.

However, logging events containing XML documents come up quite unreadable, as 
all < characters are removed from the output.

I would expect that the events arrive in Chainsaw correctly, as CDATA tags are 
enclosed around the <log4j:message> elements.
creator: apache@asgeirnilsen.com
